code: var getToken=function getToken(){var token=sessionStorage.getItem("token");if(token){return token;}else{return null;}};var setToken=function setToken(token){if(!token){return false;}sessionStorage.setItem("token",token);};var delToken=function delToken(){sessionStorage.removeItem("token");sessionStorage.removeItem("uid");sessionStorage.removeItem("url");sessionStorage.removeItem("username");sessionStorage.removeItem("nickname");sessionStorage.removeItem("isLogin");sessionStorage.removeItem("career");sessionStorage.removeItem("userImage");};export{getToken,setToken,delToken};
